frontmatter.title: Ad-hoc data collection for Tableau analysis: Quantified self, Workflow & Google Sheets
frontmatter.description: In this post, find out how to maintain some clarity and focus in your dashboard designs using three really simple techniques to make sure you build something functional and clear.

frontmatter.title: Tracking reference lines in Tableau (Quick Tip)
frontmatter.description: In the most recentÂ #makeovermonday, I used a technique where the reference line is used to track your mouse across multiple charts. This is a quick post highlighting how to do this.

frontmatter.title: Makeover Monday entry: The Presidential Race
frontmatter.description: This week I had a go at the weekly challenge set as part of the makeover Monday community. Had lots of fun doing this, it started as a line chart then ended up as total overuse of reference lines. That said it sort of works.
